oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Stockless organic farm
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Soil
Farming Systems
Crop husbandry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Organic research farm Kourla is further developed as a model for stockless organic farming. Planning and book keeping is launched using the PELTOTUKIPRO -programme and the NUTIKKAPRO-map -programme. Records of soil fertility are regularly made. The plots are offered to other units for experiments. Detailed research programmes are planned yearly.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: {Facility} KOURLA: Stockless organic farm. [Karjaton luomutila.] Start 1990. Facility Leader(s): Haapala, Hannu and Sch√§fer, Winfried, MTT Agrifood Research Finland.
